


```{r, echo=F}
urlnb <- "https://data.norges-bank.no/api/data/EXR/A.USD+EUR+SEK.NOK.SP?format=sdmx-json&startPeriod=2016-10-17&endPeriod=2023-10-13&locale=no"
gjd <- httr::GET(urlnb)
con <- httr::content(gjd, as = "text")
jda <- jsonlite::fromJSON(con)
jda$data$structure$dimensions$observation
```
